attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Married women seem to be 2nd class citizens when it come to claiming benefit's, if a husband is working or like mine seriuosly ill, we have to claim as a couple and all monies goes to my husband, even though I have paid full stamp. I am not a person I am just a number, as I expect are other women out in the wide world.It is not enough to live on but we seem to be wrong etnic origin, both born and breed in England.

rejection.details: Please reword your main sentance and extra detail to give a clear action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
